title: Reasonable 1 Bedroom Apt Near Rainbow Beach 7741-51 S. South Shore Dr.
posting_body: ['7741-51 S. South Shore Dr.', "Great California style building located next to Lake Michigan's Rainbow Beach and Chicago Park District's recreation facility.", 'One bedroom with 1 bath apartment currently available for $750.', 'Stove, refrigerator, air-conditioner, and blinds included.', '  FREE HEAT and FREE COOKING GAS.', '(Electric not included.)', 'Gated off-street parking for an additional monthly charge.', '1 Bedroom Apartments -- $750', 'No Security Deposit -- $350 Non-Refundable Move-In Fee after application is approved.', '$40 Non-Refundable Application Fee for credit and background check.', 'If you would like to schedule an appointment for a viewing, please call', 'KALABICH MANAGEMENT (708) 424-4216', 'Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m.', 'until 5:00 p.m', 'Saturdays from 8:00 a.m. until 12:00 noon.']
